author: cedricsagne
title: Nice one
review:
I got this small item by pure luck and it's just lovely. You can't really PLAY with it because it's a keyring and while I'd love to keep my keys on it, I know it would wear out and spoil it.

The legs are fixed to the upper part of the body so they can't get away, the wings are fixed (no unfolding/rotation), and the front part of the helmet does not exist, so you can touch the head.

The screw into the helmet is very solid, so if you wanted to use it as a keyring, well you could.

The legs are standard LEGO legs, which are mobile, the hands and arms (they can do their normla movement).

There is a stud in the back (not shown on photo). The head can rotate slightly on (its) right side, but not to the left side.
